name: Tinjo â€¢ makers.so template
description:
This is actually a fully responsive site. Preview it here: https://tinjo.makers.so


Tinjo is a ready to use makers.so template. Makers is a Figma Plugin to go from Figma to site with one click. 


Simply duplicate this file, install makers and turn it into a site with only one click. Then, tweak the design, make it your own and publish to your own custom domain. 


This design was inspired by the fantastic Tinjo Thomas. Go give him a follow at Twitter: he is @tinjothomasc
